reference.title: euscale-create-launch-configuration
reference.shortdesc: Creates a new auto launch configuration with the specified parameters. UNFINISHED DRAFT.

section.title: Syntax
section.codeblock: euscale-create-launch-configuration LaunchConfigurationName --image-id value --instance-type value [--block-device-mapping "key1=value1, key2=value2..." ] [--monitoring-enabled/monitoring-disabled ] [--kernel value ] [--key value ] [--ramdisk value ][--group value[,value...] ] [--user-data value ][--user-data-file value ]

row.entry: The name of the launch configuration.
Unique ID of the Eucalyptus Machine Image (EMI) to use when launching new instances in the auto scaling group.
The type of instance to launch.
A list of mappings that specify how block devices are mapped to instances launched in the auto scaling group.
Enables or disables euwatch metrics for instances launched in the auto scaling group.
The ID of the kernel associated with the EMI.
The name of a keypair that new instances in the scaling group should use.
The identifier of the ram disk associated with the EMI.
The name of the security group.
User data to be passed to launched instances.
Name of local file containing user data to be passed to launched instances.

section.title: Output
section.p: This command returns a table that contains the following:
